title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content: (Meet Commander Lightfeather.) Cat's Got Your Tongue? (Find the missing letters.) Gifts of the Wilds (Give raw goods as a donation.) Solemn Farewell (Witness the Gur funeral.) Primary Needs (Tame the dilophosaurus, making it non-hostile.) Macabre Hunt (Find all the pieces of Dribbles' body and return them to Lucretious.) Beneath the Gate (Enter the Undercellar.) For Once, a Warm Meal (Obtain room and board at the Elfsong Tavern.) Nature of the Beast (Discover the fate of the Githyanki egg.) Urba
